div.pre: 1070 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1879 Burial: c. 300-275 B.C. Contents: AE. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 23) Disposition: dispersed â€ Liutsenko, p. 20 Prushevskaia, TONGE 1945, p. 23 Possibly from the same hd. as no. 1092
